channel.title: Yesterday's Issues
channel.description: Yesterday the server kept going on and off. Any reason for these problems?

item.title: Yesterday's Issues
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Cole1497:

Would mitb be allowed to press legal charges? Just wondering, seems like it would be a legitimate sue.

I could if I knew who was doing it.

[quote=“Cole1497, post:5, topic:377690”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=473578.msg3463195#msg3463195 date=1294694336]

Would mitb be allowed to press legal charges? Just wondering, seems like it would be a legitimate sue.

For normal sites yeah but this site isn’t exactly legal
[/quote]
When Jiggletax sued MITB, the latter won.[/quote]

I’ve never been sued, unless you know something I don’t…

Read full topic

item.title: Yesterday's Issues
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Info: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,473551.0.html

[quote=“Cole1497, post:5, topic:377690”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=473578.msg3463195#msg3463195 date=1294694336]

Would mitb be allowed to press legal charges? Just wondering, seems like it would be a legitimate sue.

For normal sites yeah but this site isn’t exactly legal
[/quote]
When Jiggletax sued MITB, the latter won.[/quote]

Jagex has never sued mitb, don’t spread false rumours lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Yesterday's Issues
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=473578.msg3463096#msg3463096 date=1294689417]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=473578.msg3463066#msg3463066 date=1294687030]

Yesterday the server kept going on and off. Any reason for these problems?
[/quote]Someone was DDOSing MITB.

It was targeted at mscp, actually.
[/quote]69.39.224.48 - 69.39.224.52 not big of a difference.[/quote]The target was moparisthebest.com, not the direct IP. When he changed the DNS for moparisthebest.com, the DDOS followed; so he wasn’t directing it at the IPs. AKA - Similarities in IP mean nothing.

OT - The culprit hasn’t been found

Read full topic
